mapper.select: SELECT POI_IDX, POI_NAME, POI_ADDR, POI_LAT, POI_LNG, POI_INFO, CASE WHEN POI_CLOSEDAY IS NULL THEN '없음' ELSE POI_CLOSEDAY END AS POI_CLOSEDAY, CASE WHEN POI_AVAILABLE IS NULL THEN '없음' ELSE POI_AVAILABLE END AS POI_AVAILABLE, CASE WHEN POI_PARKING IS NULL THEN '없음' ELSE POI_PARKING END AS POI_PARKING, POI_REGION, POI_TAG, POI_IMG FROM ( SELECT pois.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY poi_idx) AS row_num FROM pois ) WHERE row_num BETWEEN #{num}-9 AND #{num}
select * from TRIP_SCHEDULES where trip_idx = #{id} and sche_day = #{day}
mapper.update: update TRIP_SCHEDULES set trip_sche = #{schedule} where trip_idx = #{id} and sche_day = #{day}
